1082.question: What systems are tested?
1082.response: {'Answer': 'The systems tested are various configurations of x-vector/PLDA systems used for automatic spoken language assessment, specifically speaker verification tasks. The systems include: BULATS x-vector/PLDA, VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA, systems with PLDA adaptation, extractor fine-tuning, and a combination of systems. These systems are tested on the BULATS and Linguaskill test sets under different conditions concerning gender, language proficiency grade (A1, A2, B1, B2, C), first language (L1) of speakers, and with regard to preventing malpractice.'}
1082.answer:
BULATS i-vector/PLDA
BULATS x-vector/PLDA
VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA
PLDA adaptation (X1)
 Extractor fine-tuning (X2)
